content:
Set Up Lightning Knowledge with a Guided Setup Flow

The Lightning Knowledge setup flow is a quick way to get your knowledge base started. Enable Lightning Knowledge, choose article authors, and make a few data category groups. Build the momentum by configuring page layouts, record types, and processes.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Service Cloud is available in all editions with Service Cloud.

You can embed Lightning Knowledge in the console so that your support agents can easily find, access, and deliver the right answers to customers. Agents can also contribute to the knowledge base, ensuring that the best answers are always accessible to the whole team.

IMPORTANT After you enable Lightning Knowledge, you can’t disable it.

To access the setup flow, go to Service Setup in Lightning Experience by clicking  and selecting Service Setup.

The flow is available from Service Setup and guides you through enabling Lightning Knowledge, choosing knowledge article authors, creating data categories and data category groups, and turning on several things in the background during the setup flow.

Enabling Lightning Knowledge can’t be undone. Don’t worry about this if you’ve never used Knowledge before and you’re ready to dive in on Lightning Experience.

The setup flow auto-enables a default FAQ page layout and record type, which determines how the articles are displayed. After completing the flow, you can go to the Object Manager to create or modify your page layouts.

Your selected authors get full read, write, and publishing access through the Knowledge LSF permission set, and access to the Knowledge Object. The setup flow auto-enables the page layout and record type for these profiles. Everyone whom you designate an author gets a Knowledge User License.

The setup flow grants data category visibility to profiles selected on the Choose Author screen.

Learn where you can customize and view what you set up during the Lightning Knowledge setup flow.
title: Setting Up Lightning Knowledge
